message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe it's a bit higher than I'm willing to pay. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $850000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $920000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to go up to $900000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. However, I'm still a bit away from your maximum offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $900000 and my previous offer of $920000. How about we settle at $910000?
I'm starting to think that we're getting close, but I still think I can get a better deal. I'm willing to meet you at $900000, but I'm not going any higher than that. Can you accept this price?
